item.title: SwissCheese - Exploiting The Pattern Matching Swiss Knife
item.description: Cheese, Gromit In this short incredibly lengthy post I’ll talk about the binary format of YARA rules and also a bit about exploiting two vulnerabilities I found in it. I named this SwissCheese becuase I found it amusing that the “Pattern Matching Swiss Knife” had quite a few holes in it ;D If you want to skip straight to the exploitation part, go to WAT or take a look at the repo.
